1546237307_1J58Rie679DVSuKB1iDyFFTbzmaMa.body:
[Docker](https://www.docker.com) can be used to easily run the [@nofish's zeronet image](https://hub.docker.com/r/nofish/zeronet) on any Linux box.

Here's my script, that automates the most steps: [docker-zeronet-wrapper](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1FEvdSRAqTEuGpc31s9ad7rPc4jqRpeWfG/)
And here's a short manual: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1BLoGBTid3NhGu8ts3fAfHJprnbrH3wfTV/?Post:16

Looks like I should implement an option to enable or disable ZeroNet plugins from the script as well. :)
